join hortbot 2 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set
send hortbot #foobar [HB] usage: !set <setting> <value>

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set idontexist
send hortbot #foobar [HB] No such setting 'idontexist'.
